  We added a new device to our collection: a [Purple Air](https://www2.purpleair.com/) air quality sensor. The Purple Air sensor measures PM2.5 particle pollution.

  There's a large community of people participating in this air quality monitoring, all over North America[^1]. See the Galiwatch measurments update real-time!
